name: NiFT, the NFT Library
about: A small clone of OpenSea.com built with a full MERN stack. Browse, create, and own unauthentic NFTs.

name: Pokémon Advantage Calculator
about: A Pokémon advantage calculator built with Javascript, CSS, and React. All data provided by the Pokémon RESTful API.

name: Homer's Casino Blackjack
about: A Homer Simpson themed blackjack game built with HTML, CSS, and Javascript.
